name: Rumme and Bippo Detect Eggs
description:
That is a tiny just-for-fun game on a friend's birthday :)

Rumme and Bippo are journalists and adventurers around their country, writing articles for a travel journal.

They have a little home museum with wonderthings they gathered in their journey and some gifts from others. But today their collection must be revised a bit...

It's left silent to be played in browser without lags and because I'm no composer at all.

Cheers!
